name: Quantum Buddy
description:
(Should be played fullscreen with the blue button)

Controls:

Movement: A/D and Left/Right Arrows

Jump: Space

Pick-Up/Drop Cube: E

Move "Vision Square": Drag and Drop

===============================================================

Hello !

Here's a prototype for a puzzle-platformer game I might make in the future.

I'm not gonna spoil too much the puzzles here, but just prepare youtself to play with Quantum Objects ! (You might see the completely assumed Outer Wilds inspiration)

It's playable in browser but it's not the best experience, so if you want a better one you can download the zip-file right there. I really recommend it.

(BY THE WAY THE DOWNLOADABLE CONTAINS THE SOLUTIONS IF YOU NEED SOME HELP).

Have fun :D !
